content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

###Coal Mining Station at position(24.0, -15.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (position 24.0, -15.0)
- Wooden chest for coal storage (position 23.5, -16.5) containing 301 coal

###Iron Ore Mining Station at position(-14.0, 23.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (position -14.0, 23.0)
- Wooden chest for iron ore storage (position -14.5, 21.5) containing 333 iron ore

###Iron Smelting Line at position(-11.0, 20.0)
Consists of:
- Stone furnace (position -11.0, 20.0) with 23 coal
- Stone furnace (position -9.0, 20.0) with 23 coal

###Copper Processing System at position(20.0, 20.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill for copper ore (position 20.0, 20.0)
- Input wooden chest (position 20.5, 21.5) containing 379 copper ore
- Secondary input wooden chest (position 22.5, 21.5) containing 377 copper ore
- Stone furnace (position 24.0, 20.0) with 50 coal
- Output wooden chest (position 24.5, 17.5) containing 53 copper plates
- Burner inserter (position 24.5, 18.5) moving items from furnace to output chest
- Burner inserter (position 22.5, 20.5) moving items from input chest to furnace

ERROR TIPS

###Errors when attempting to insert items into full inventories
- Check inventory capacity before attempting to insert items
- Remove items from full inventories before attempting to add more
- In this case, the furnace's coal inventory was full (50/50 items)

###Entity status monitoring needed
- Multiple furnaces are showing "no ingredients to smelt" status
- Ensure proper item flow from input chests to furnaces using inserters
- Verify inserter pickup and drop positions are correctly configured
- Make sure all machines have sufficient fuel to operate

###Mining drill maintenance
- Some mining drills are showing "out of fuel" warnings
- Regularly check and refuel mining drills to maintain continuous operation
